item.title: 7 Reasons NOT to Be My Boss
item.description: This isn’t for everyone. Actually, it’s not for most people, even most people who follow or believe in my work. And I don’t want any of you beautiful humans reading this to get the wrong idea. Following are several compelling reasons you should not, under any circumstance, be my boss. In all sincerity, and with kindness and compassion, please don’t be my boss if… The dollars will make it difficult for you to make ends meet.

item.title: How
item.description: Do you care about the work I’m doing? Be my boss and you’ll be directly involved in — and responsible for — everything I create, publish, or send out into the world. And it works like any employee/employer relationship: Pay me a monthly salary. You choose the amount ($1 per month minimum), based on what you think my work is worth, what’s in the budget, or how much you want to give.
